subject: Pedal upgrade inquiry
description_text:
Hello. I currently have a thrustmaster TX leather edition mounted to an NLR
wheel stand 2.0.

I was interested in upgrading to your Plus X pedals but can't seem to
figure out if I will need a base plate or not. Would you be able to advise
on this? Do you sell the baseplate separately?

Thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Lasher,     These are the baseboard dimensions for our PlusX and ProX Ultra, for your reference.Â
